Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train near 35th/Archer. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train near 35th/Archer.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
